name: nonff_rescue_birth_month_year
description: The date of birth of the person(s) injured or rescued.

name: nonff_rescue_gender
description: The gender of the person(s) injured or rescued.

name: nonff_rescue_race
description: The race of the person(s) injured or rescued.

name: nonff_rescue_type
description: Whether there was a rescue, non-rescue, assist, or self evacuation

name: nonff_rescue_presence_known
description: Whether the presence of an occupant in need of rescue was known

name: nonff_rescue_actions
description: Actions taken to support the rescue

name: nonff_rescue_impedance_type
description: Whether conditions impacted the ability of rescue

name: nonff_rescue_room_type
description: The type of room/space from which the occupant was rescued

name: nonff_rescue_elevation_type
description: The elevation at which the occupant was found

name: nonff_rescue_gas_isolation
description: Whether the space was isolated from the flow of heat and/or toxic gases

name: nonff_rescue_removal_path_type
description: Route along which removal from the structure occurred

name: nonff_rescue_fire_relative_time
description: Relative to suppression, when the occupant was removed from the structure

name: nonff_casualty_casualty_type
description: Whether the person was uninjured, injured nonfatally, injured fatally

name: nonff_casualty_casualty_cause
description: The apparent cause of the injury or fatality
